DataSourcePortable.Name: FX_FLUXO_LANCAMENTO
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT SUM(CENARIO.VALOR) VALOR,
 CENARIO.DATA
 FROM FX_CENARIO CENARIO
 WHERE CENARIO.FLUXO = 123
 GROUP BY CENARIO.DATA
 ORDER BY CENARIO.DATA" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" /> <Field Alias="DATA" From="A" Path="DATA" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
